Pre-Game Insights: Argentina will meet Peru in the last round of group-stage matches at the 2024 Copa America, on June 29 at 8:00 PM ET.
Argentina is -170 to win this group-stage game, Peru is +550, and the draw is +275.
Sportsbooks have set 1.5 goals as the over/under for this game.
We are predicting Argentina to win, with a 63.0% chance of winning this match, based on the moneyline.
Argentina is fifth in the Copa America in goals scored (three overall, 1.5 per game), and Peru is second in goals conceded (one overall, 0.5 per game).
In international matches the past two years, Argentina has scored 35 goals (2.2 per game) and Peru has given up 16 goals (1.0 per game).
Peru has not scored a goal yet in this tournament, and Argentina has not conceded a goal yet.
In international matches the past two years, Peru has scored 10 goals (0.6 per game) and Argentina has given up four goals (0.3 per game).
Argentina has outscored opponents 3-0 in the Copa America, and its +3 goal differential is third in the tournament. It was +31 the past two years.
In terms of goal differential, Peru is ninth in the Copa America at -1. It was -6 the past two years.
